description.@en: You wear the armor of your god and can invoke His prayers. They speak of judgement, righteous fury and execution. You are the God-Emperorâ€™s priest elect and forces of chaos best step aside or else suffer from your holy incantations.

effect.@en: You can now attempt to learn Magicks from the Prayers of the God-Emperor. In addition, you automatically learn one Petty and one Lesser Magick spell from the Prayers of the GodEmperor. You cannot cast Lesser Magick from the Prayers of the God-Emperor until you have two Skill Ranks in Incantation. You can continue to learn Generalist Magick. Finally, you may only ever use Prayers of the God-Emperor and cannot adopt any other Profession that gives different Prayer types.
